attributes.action: Jail  Men whom wait about toilets for sex as  this places the public in danger
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
local authorities have been closing down public toilets , as they are unable to police them due to men waiting in toilets for sex.
This puts the public"s safety in danger , these men should be jailed for a minimum sentence of 10 years to discourage these men.
